tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vendor_spend_patterns (
    vendor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
    total_spent DECIMAL,
    last_purchase_date DATE,
    cost_saving_opportunities TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE vendor_spend (
  vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
  total_spend DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE purchase_orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_id INT,
  order_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE savings_opportunities (
    opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    opportunity_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    estimated_savings DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vendors (
    vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    email_address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE purchase_orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    unit_price DECIMAL(8, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE order_details (
    order_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    unit_cost DECIMAL(8, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES purchase_orders(order_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
)

CREATE TABLE purchase_orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    order_total DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendor_spending(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    total_price DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES purchase_orders(order_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product_catalog(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE spend_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    month INT,
    year INT,
    total_spend DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendor_spending(vendor_id)
);
